definitions: the transfer of something for control or management by a group of individuals or organizations

examples.text: the syndication of loans to investors
national syndication firms that buy the equity on properties
credit market problems will restrict demand for loan syndications

definitions: the sale or licensing of material for publication or broadcasting by a number of television stations, periodicals, etc.

examples.text: 100 episodes of programming are available for television syndication
a more recent syndication package of the famous old sitcom WKRP in Cincinnati

shortDefinitions: sale or licensing of material for publication or broadcasting
